[set page_title]Payment Preferences - PGP[/set] [set ui_checklist]1[/set] [set help_name]wizard.pgp[/set] @_UI_STD_HEAD_@
Enter the values used to enable payment processing through PGP or GnuPG.
If you already have a GPG keyring, possible keys to encrypt against should be displayed. You may select one, or you may input a new PGP/GPG public key to add to the keyring at time of preview.
